trans-unit.source: about_PSSessions
trans-unit.target: about_PSSessions

trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: About PSSessions
trans-unit.target: 有关 Pssession

trans-unit.source: about_PSSessions
trans-unit.target: about_PSSessions

trans-unit.source: about_PSSessions
trans-unit.target: about_PSSessions

trans-unit.source: SHORT DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 简短说明

trans-unit.source: Describes Windows PowerShell� sessions (PSSessions) and explains how to establish a persistent connection to a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 介绍 Windows PowerShell 会话 (Pssession) 并说明如何建立与远程计算机建立持久连接。

trans-unit.source: LONG DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 详细说明

trans-unit.source: To run Windows PowerShell commands on a remote computer, you can use the ComputerName parameter of a cmdlet, or you can create a Windows PowerShell session (PSSession) and run commands in the PSSession.
trans-unit.target: 要在远程计算机上运行 Windows PowerShell 命令，可以使用 cmdlet 的 ComputerName 参数也可以创建 Windows PowerShell 会话 (PSSession) 并在 PSSession 中运行命令。

trans-unit.source: When you create a PSSession, Windows PowerShell establishes a persistent connection to the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 PSSession 时，Windows PowerShell 将建立与远程计算机建立持久连接。

trans-unit.source: Use a PSSession to run a series of related commands on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用 PSSession 在远程计算机上运行的一系列相关命令。

trans-unit.source: Commands that run in the same PSSession can share data, such as the values of variables, aliases, and functions.
trans-unit.target: 相同的 PSSession 中运行的命令可以共享数据，如变量、 别名和函数的值。

trans-unit.source: You can also create a PSSession on the local computer and run commands in it.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以在本地计算机上创建 PSSession 并在其中运行命令。

trans-unit.source: A local PSSession uses the Windows PowerShell remoting infrastructure to create and maintain the PSSession.
trans-unit.target: 本地 PSSession 使用 Windows PowerShell 远程处理基础结构来创建和维护 PSSession。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, PSSessions are independent of the sessions in which they are created.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始，Pssession 均独立于创建它们的会话。

trans-unit.source: Active PSSessions are maintained on the remote computer (or the computer at the remote end or "server-side" of the connection).
trans-unit.target: 在远程计算机 （或位于远程端或"服务器端"的连接的计算机） 上维护活动的 Pssession。

trans-unit.source: As a result, you can disconnect from the PSSession and reconnect to it at a later time from the same computer or from a different computer.
trans-unit.target: 因此，可以断开与 PSSession 的连接并重新连接到它在以后从同一台计算机或另一台计算机。

trans-unit.source: This topic explains how to create, use, get, and delete PSSessions.
trans-unit.target: 本主题说明如何创建、 使用、 获取，并删除 Pssession。

trans-unit.source: For more advanced information, see about_PSSession_Details.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多高级信息，请参阅 about_PSSession_Details。

trans-unit.source: Note: PSSessions use the Windows PowerShell remoting infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ Pssession 都使用 Windows PowerShell 远程处理基础结构。

trans-unit.source: To use PSSessions, the local and remote computers must be configured for remoting.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 Pssession，必须以进行远程处理配置本地和远程计算机。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Remote_Requirements.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Remote_Requirements。

trans-unit.source: In Windows Vista and later versions of Windows, to create a PSSession on a local computer, you must start Windows PowerShell with the "Run as administrator" option.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Vista 和更高版本的 Windows 中，创建一个 PSSession 在本地计算机上，您必须启动 Windows PowerShell 使用"以管理员身份运行"选项。

trans-unit.source: WHAT IS A SESSION?
trans-unit.target: 会话是什么？

trans-unit.source: A session is an environment in which Windows PowerShell runs.
trans-unit.target: 会话就是 Windows PowerShell 的运行环境。

trans-unit.source: Each time you start Windows PowerShell, a session is created for you, and you can run commands in the session.
trans-unit.target: 每次启动 Windows PowerShell 时，为您创建一个会话，并且可以在会话中运行命令。

trans-unit.source: You can also add items to your session, such as modules and snap-ins, and you can create items, such as variables, functions, and aliases.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以将项添加到您的会话，如模块和管理单元，并且可以创建项，如变量、 函数和别名。

trans-unit.source: These items exist only in the session and are deleted when the session ends.
trans-unit.target: 这些项仅在该会话中存在，并在会话结束时删除。

trans-unit.source: You can also create user-managed sessions, known as " Windows PowerShell sessions" or "PSSessions," on the local computer or on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以创建用户托管的会话，称为"Windows PowerShell 会话"或"Pssession，"在本地计算机或远程计算机上。

trans-unit.source: Like the default session, you can run commands in a PSSession and add and create items.
trans-unit.target: 像默认会话中，可以在 PSSession 中运行命令和添加和创建项。

trans-unit.source: However, unlike the session that starts automatically, you can control the PSSessions that you create.
trans-unit.target: 但是，与不同的会话中会自动启动，您可以控制您创建的 Pssession。

trans-unit.source: You can get, create, configure, and remove them, disconnect and reconnect to them, and run multiple commands in the same PSSession.
trans-unit.target: 您可以获取、 创建、 配置和删除它们、 断开连接并连接到它们，和在相同的 PSSession 中运行多个命令。

trans-unit.source: The PSSession remains available until you delete it or it times out.
trans-unit.target: 直到将其删除或超时时，PSSession 仍然可用。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you create a PSSession to run a series of related commands on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，您创建的 PSSession 在远程计算机上运行的一系列相关命令。

trans-unit.source: When you create a PSSession on a remote computer, Windows PowerShell establishes a persistent connection to the remote computer to support the session.
trans-unit.target: 在远程计算机上创建 PSSession 时，Windows PowerShell 将建立到远程计算机，以支持会话持续性连接。

trans-unit.source: If you use the ComputerName parameter of the Invoke-Command or Enter-PSSession cmdlet to run a remote command or to start an interactive session, Windows PowerShell creates a temporary session on the remote computer and closes the session as soon as the command is complete or as soon as the interactive session ends.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 Invoke-command 或 Enter-pssession cmdlet 的 ComputerName 参数来运行远程命令或启动交互式会话，Windows PowerShell 在远程计算机上创建一个临时会话，并关闭了会话，一旦完成该命令后或交互式会话结束。

trans-unit.source: You cannot control these temporary sessions, and you cannot use them for more than a single command or a single interactive session.
trans-unit.target: 您不能控制这些临时会话，并能将它们用于多个单个命令或一个交互式会话。

trans-unit.source: In Windows PowerShell, the "current session" is the session that you are working in.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 中，"当前会话"是您正在使用的会话。

trans-unit.source: The "current session" can refer to any session, including a temporary session or a PSSession.
trans-unit.target: "当前会话"可以引用的任何会话，包括临时会话或 PSSession。

trans-unit.source: WHY USE A PSSESSION?
trans-unit.target: 为什么要使用 PSSESSION？

trans-unit.source: Use a PSSession when you need a persistent connection to a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 当你需要与远程计算机建立持久连接时，请使用 PSSession。

trans-unit.source: With a PSSession, you can run a series of commands that share data, such as the value of variables, the contents of a function, or the definition of an alias.
trans-unit.target: 使用 PSSession，可以运行一系列共享数据，如变量、 函数的内容或别名的定义值的命令。

trans-unit.source: You can run remote commands without creating a PSSession.
trans-unit.target: 您可以运行远程命令，而无需创建 PSSession。

trans-unit.source: Use the ComputerName parameter of remote-enabled cmdlets to run a single command or a series of unrelated commands on one or many computers.
trans-unit.target: 远程启用 cmdlet 的 ComputerName 参数用于在一个或多个计算机上运行的单个命令或一系列不相关的命令。

trans-unit.source: When you use the ComputerName parameter of Invoke-Command or Enter-PSSession, Windows PowerShell establishes a temporary connection to the remote computer and then closes the connection as soon as the command is complete.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 Invoke-command 或 enter 键 PSSession 的 ComputerName 参数时，Windows PowerShell 将建立与远程计算机的临时连接，然后关闭连接，一旦完成该命令后。

trans-unit.source: Any data elements that you create are lost when the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 连接已关闭时，您创建的任何数据元素都会丢失。

trans-unit.source: Other cmdlets that have a ComputerName parameter, such as Get-Eventlog and Get-WmiObject, use different remoting technologies to gather data.
trans-unit.target: 具有 ComputerName 参数，如 Get-eventlog 和 Get-wmiobject，其他 cmdlet 使用不同的远程处理技术来收集数据。

trans-unit.source: None create a persistent connection like a PSSession.
trans-unit.target: 无创建类似 PSSession 的持续性连接。

trans-unit.source: HOW TO CREATE A PSSESSION
trans-unit.target: 如何创建一个 PSSESSION

trans-unit.source: To create a PSSession, use the New-PSSession cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建 PSSession，请使用 New-PSSession cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To create the PSSession on a remote computer, use the ComputerName parameter of the New-PSSession cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要在远程计算机上创建 PSSession，请使用 New-pssession cmdlet 的 ComputerName 参数。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command creates a new PSSession on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下命令在 Server01 计算机上创建一个新的 PSSession。

trans-unit.source: When you submit the command, New-PSSession creates the PSSession and returns an object that represents the PSSession.
trans-unit.target: 当您提交该命令时，New-pssession 创建 PSSession，并返回一个对象，表示 PSSession。

trans-unit.source: You can save the object in a variable when you create the PSSession, or you can use a Get-PSSession command to get the PSSession at a later time.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 PSSession，或使用 Get-pssession 命令用于在更高版本时获取 PSSession 时，可以在变量中保存对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command creates a new PSSession on the Server01 computer and saves the resulting object in the $ps variable.
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下命令在 Server01 计算机上创建一个新的 PSSession，并将生成的对象保存在 $ps 变量。

trans-unit.source: HOW TO CREATE PSSESSIONS ON MULTIPLE COMPUTERS
trans-unit.target: 如何在多台计算机上创建 PSSESSION

trans-unit.source: To create PSSessions on multiple computers, use the ComputerName parameter of the New-PSSession cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要在多台计算机上创建 Pssession，请使用 New-pssession cmdlet 的 ComputerName 参数。

trans-unit.source: Type the names of the remote computers in a comma-separated list.
trans-unit.target: 键入以逗号分隔的列表中的远程计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, to create PSSessions on the Server01, Server02, and Server03 computers, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要在 Server01、 Server02 和 Server03 计算机上创建 Pssession，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: New-PSSession creates one PSSession on each of the remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 新 PSSession 每台远程计算机上创建一个 PSSession。

trans-unit.source: HOW TO GET PSSESSIONS
trans-unit.target: 如何获取 PSSESSION

trans-unit.source: To get the PSSessions that were created in your current session, use the Get-PSSession cmdlet without the ComputerName parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取当前会话中创建的 Pssession，请使用 Get-pssession cmdlet 不使用 ComputerName 参数。

trans-unit.source: Get-PSSession returns the same type of object that New-PSSession returns.
trans-unit.target: Get-pssession 返回相同的 New-pssession 返回的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: The following command gets all the PSSessions that were created in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 以下命令将获取当前会话中创建的所有 Pssession。

trans-unit.source: The default display of the PSSessions shows their ID and a default display name.
trans-unit.target: 将默认的 Pssession 中显示其 ID 和默认值的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: You can assign an alternate display name when you create the session.
trans-unit.target: 当创建会话时，您可以分配的可选显示名称。

trans-unit.source: You can also save the PSSessions in a variable.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以将 Pssession 保存在变量中。

trans-unit.source: The following command gets the PSSessions and saves them in the $ps123 variable.
trans-unit.target: 以下命令获取 Pssession，并将它们保存在 $ps123 变量中。

trans-unit.source: When using the PSSession cmdlets, you can refer to a PSSession by its ID, by its name, or by its instance ID (a GUID).
trans-unit.target: 在使用 PSSession cmdlet 时，您可以引用 PSSession 由其 ID、 它的名称，则其实例 ID (GUID)。

trans-unit.source: The following command gets a PSSession by its ID and saves it in the $ps01 variable.
trans-unit.target: 以下命令获取由其 ID 的 PSSession，并将其保存在 $ps01 变量中。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, PSSessions are maintained on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始，Pssession 在远程计算机上进行维护。

trans-unit.source: To get PSSessions that you created on particular remote computers, use the ComputerName parameter of the Get-PSSession cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取特定的远程计算机创建的 Pssession，请使用 Get-pssession cmdlet 的 ComputerName 参数。

trans-unit.source: The following command gets the PSSessions that you created on the Server01 remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 以下命令将获取在 Server01 远程计算机创建的 Pssession。

trans-unit.source: This includes PSSessions created in the current session and in other sessions on the local computer or other computers.
trans-unit.target: 这包括在当前会话中和在本地计算机或其他计算机上的其他会话中创建的 Pssession。

trans-unit.source: In Windows PowerShell 2.0, Get-PSSession gets only the PSSessions that were created in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 2.0 Get-pssession 获取仅在当前会话中创建的 Pssession。

trans-unit.source: It does not get PSSessions that were created in other sessions or on other computers, even if the sessions are connected to and are running commands on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 它不会创建其他会话中或在其他计算机上，即使在会话连接到并且在本地计算机上运行命令的 Pssession。

trans-unit.source: HOW TO RUN COMMANDS IN A PSSESSION
trans-unit.target: 如何在 PSSESSION 中运行命令

trans-unit.source: To run a command in one or more PSSessions, use the Invoke-Command cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要在一个或多个 Pssession 中运行命令，请使用 Invoke-command cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Use the Session parameter to specify the PSSessions and the ScriptBlock parameter to specify the command.
trans-unit.target: 使用会话参数来指定 Pssession 和 ScriptBlock 参数来指定的命令。

trans-unit.source: For example, to run a Get-ChildItem ("dir") command in each of the three PSSessions saved in the $ps123 variable, type:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要运行的 Get-childitem ("dir") 中每个这三个 Pssession 的命令保存在 $ps123 变量中，类型︰

trans-unit.source: HOW TO DELETE PSSESSIONS
trans-unit.target: 如何删除 PSSESSION

trans-unit.source: When you are finished with the PSSession, use the Remove-PSSession cmdlet to delete the PSSession and to release the resources that it was using.
trans-unit.target: 完 PSSession 后，使用 Remove-pssession cmdlet 删除 PSSession 并释放正在使用的资源。

trans-unit.source: or -
trans-unit.target: 或-

trans-unit.source: To remove a PSSession from a remote computer, use the ComputerName parameter of the Remove-PSSession cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要从远程计算机中删除 PSSession，请使用 Remove-pssession cmdlet 的 ComputerName 参数。

trans-unit.source: If you do not delete the PSSession, the PSSession remains available for use until it times out.
trans-unit.target: 如果不删除 PSSession，PSSession 将保留可供使用超时为止。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the IdleTimeout parameter of the New-PSSessionOption cmdlet to set an expiration time for an idle PSSession.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 New-pssessionoption cmdlet 的 IdleTimeout 参数为空闲状态的 PSSession 中设置一个过期时间。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see New-PSSessionOption.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 New-pssessionoption。

trans-unit.source: THE PSSESSION CMDLETS
trans-unit.target: PSSESSION CMDLET

trans-unit.source: For a list of PSSession cmdlets, type:
trans-unit.target: PSSession 的 cmdlet 的列表，请键入︰

trans-unit.source: FOR MORE INFORMATION
trans-unit.target: 详细信息

trans-unit.source: For more information about PSSessions, see about_PSSession_Details.
trans-unit.target: Pssession 的详细信息，请参阅 about_PSSession_Details。

trans-unit.target: 另请参阅
